channel.title: Laptop Sale: Lenovo
channel.description: http://shop.lenovo.com/SEUILibrary/controller/e/web/LenovoPortal/en_US/catalog.workflow:category.details?current-catalog-id=12F0696583E04D86B9B79B0FEC01C087&current-category-id=C46D71ACFD7C4475B8E490358F8CA8C3&menu-id=products#.UN5IIW_AccM I found this, on Lenovo. I was looking for a gaming laptop, and BY far this is the cheapest I have ever encountered The laptop has decent specs, 650m for under 1000$ I was wondering, if you guys brought a laptop from lenovo, (i wonder if their customer service is good) if its okay. i was about to buy a decent i7 (intel 4000 HD which is better than the 630m) but it was much more expensive I wanted to ask if this is the best gaming laptop deal you can get for 800 dollars

item.title: Laptop Sale: Lenovo
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:4, topic:476888”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=595053.msg4190582#msg4190582 date=1356746473]

I wanted to ask if this is the best gaming laptop deal you can get for 800 dollars

building your own would be a lot cheaper than a pre-built

i dont know how to build a laptop
I want a computer that I can carry around
because I already built myself a decent desktop
[/quote]
You dont know how to build a laptop but you built one? lolk[/quote]
DESKTOP.LAPTOP, Know the difference

Read full topic
